attributes.review: I would first like to say do not support this app because of course like many apps China is using it to collect data on the U.S. On top of that it took ages to download and as soon as it opened it began to glitch. There are so many bugs on this app that make it so terrible. I donâ€™t know why this is being condoned and needs to be removed as soon as possible. I hate to see people believing that this app actually works when my experience with it so far has only been negative. Even when I tried to register for an event it started glitching and took me to another app. These are problems that cannot be fix and this app just needs to be removed.
